Articles.Content:
A very interesting page with optical images of the Apollo spacecraft, en route to and from the Moon. (the best photos are the earlier ones): http://www.astr.ua.edu/keel/space/apollo.html Do you remember 'From the Earth to the Moon', and the 48000x telescope on the Rocky Mountains to track the projectile of the Columbiad?

Looking forward to seeing similar stuff in KSP, maybe

Wow, that\'s great.

I hope KSP will have telescopes in the future so we can spy on our spacecrafts.
